DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of our study is to determine if the evaluation of ingesta of cancer patients by VAS (on the day of hospitalization) is able to predict the actual ingesta of patients during hospitalization (for patients malnourished, at risk of malnutrition or risk free).
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Predictive Visual Analog Scale (VAS) for Determining the Ingesta of Patients Carrying a Digestive Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients aged over 18 years Admitted to hospital for systemic therapy of gastrointestinal cancer Signature of the nonopposition. Patients who because of their affection will fasted more than 12:00 during the three days preceding hospitalization. Artificial nutrition Patients
